"w-full rounded-3xl border border-white/10 bg-slate-950/80 p-5 text-white backdrop-blur-2xl shadow-soft animate-glass" : "w-80 rounded-3xl border border-white/10 bg-slate-950/75 p-6 text-white backdrop-blur-2xl shadow-soft animate-glass"; return (

{hotspot.title}

Bloco
{hotspot.block ?? "Não informado"}
Andar
{hotspot.floorLabel ?? "Referência do layer"}
Descrição
{hotspot.description}
{hasActiveRoute ? ( ) : null}
); } export default InfoPanel;
